popupPowerSwitchInfo.message:
Clic: dezactivează/activează AdBlock Plus Free pentru acest site.

Ctrl+clic: dezactivează AdBlock Plus Free doar pe această pagină.
popupPowerSwitchInfo.description:
English: Click: disable/enable AdBlock Plus Free for this site.

Ctrl+click: disable AdBlock Plus Free only on this page.

popupTipDashboard.description: English: Click to open the dashboard

popupSiteInlineScriptEnabled.message: Inline script tags are allowed on this site

popupSiteInlineScriptDisabled.message: Inline script tags are blocked on this site

popupDefaultInlineScriptEnabled.message: Inline script tags are allowed everywhere by default

popupDefaultInlineScriptDisabled.message: Inline script tags are blocked everywhere by default

popupHitDomainCountPrompt.message: Connected to {{count}} distinct domain(s) out of {{total}}

settingsCollapseBlockedPrompt.description: English: Hide placeholders of blocked elements

settingsIconBadgePrompt.message: Arată numărul cererilor blocate pe pictogramă
settingsIconBadgePrompt.description: English: Show the number of blocked requests on the icon

settingsContextMenuPrompt.message: Folosește meniul contextual unde este cazul
settingsContextMenuPrompt.description: English: Make use of context menu where appropriate

settingsAdvancedUserPrompt.message: I am an advanced user (Required reading)

3pListsOfBlockedHostsPrompt.description: English: {{netFilterCount}} network filters ＋ {{cosmeticFilterCount}} cosmetic filters from:

3pAutoUpdatePrompt1.message: Actualizare automată a listelor de filtre.

3pParseAllABPHideFiltersPrompt1.description: English: Parse and enforce Adblock+ element hiding filters.

3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo.message:
Aceasta optiune permite citirea si aplicarea filtrelor Adblock Plus a elementelor de ascuns. Aceste filtre sunt in esenta vizuale, acestea servind la ascunderea elementelor intr-un site care sunt marcate ca inutile si care nu pot fi blocate de cererile pe baza de filtre net.

Activand aceasta optiune memoria utilizata de AdBlock Plus Free va creste

3pExternalListsHint.message: O adresa pe linie. Liniile care incep cu ‘!’ vor fi ignorate. Adresele invalide vor fi ignorate fara avertizare.
3pExternalListsHint.description: English: One URL per line. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored. Invalid URLs will be silently ignored.

1pFormatHint.message: Un filtru pe linie. Un filtru poate fi o adresa sau un filtru compatibil Adblock Plus. Liniile precedate de ‘!’ vor fi ignorate.
1pFormatHint.description: English: One filter per line. A filter can be a plain hostname, or an Adblock Plus-compatible filter. Lines prefixed with ‘!’ will be ignored.

rulesEditSave.description: Will save manually-edited content and exit manual-edit mode

rulesEditDiscard.description: Will discard manually-edited content and exit manual-edit mode

rulesHint.message: List of your dynamic filtering rules.
rulesHint.description: English: List of your dynamic filtering rules.

rulesFormatHint.message: Rule syntax: source destination type action (full documentation).
rulesFormatHint.description: English: dynamic rule syntax and full documentation.

whitelistPrompt.message: Lista ta de nume de gazde unde AdBlock Plus Free va fi dezactivat. Fiecare adresă pe o singura linie. Adresele nevalide vor fi ignorate automat.
whitelistPrompt.description: English: Your list of host names for which AdBlock Plus Free will be disabled. One host name per line. Invalid host names will be silently ignored.

logNetRequestsPrompt.description: English: Enable the logging of network requests

logNetRequestsHelp.message: Poti inspecta detaliile cererilor de retea daca vrei, activand aceasta optiune. Inregistrarea cererilor de retea poate conduce la cresterea gradului de utilizare a memoriei de catre AdBlock Plus Free. Pentru ca multi utilizatori n-or sa foloseasca niciodata aceasta optiune, aceasta este dezactivata implicit.

logBlockedRequestsEmpty.message: Nicio cerere blocată pentru această pagină
logBlockedRequestsEmpty.description: English: No blocked requests logged for this page

logAllowedRequestsEmpty.message: Nicio cerere ne-blocată pentru această pagină
logAllowedRequestsEmpty.description: English: No non-blocked requests logged for this page

logBehindTheScene.description: Pretty name for behind-the-scene network requests

aboutRestoreDataConfirm.message:
All your settings will be overwritten using data backed up on {{time}}, and AdBlock Plus Free will restart.

Overwrite all existing settings using backed up data?
aboutRestoreDataConfirm.description: Message asking user to confirm restore

aboutRestoreDataError.message: The data could not be read or is invalid
aboutRestoreDataError.description: Message to display when an error occurred during restore

aboutResetDataConfirm.message:
All your settings will be removed, and AdBlock Plus Free will restart.

Reset AdBlock Plus Free to factory settings?
aboutResetDataConfirm.description: Message asking user to confirm reset

errorCantConnectTo.description: English: Network error: unable to connect to {{url}}
